hero.title: World’s First Vibe Selling Agent
hero.subtitle: Conversational AI Sales Agent, representing You 24/7. Dealism is designed to simplify the complexity of human conversation while keeping persuasion deeply personal and natural.

items.title: Pretty Human-Like
items.description: Instead of a generic chatbot, you'll have a sales rep that speaks in your tone and reflects your personality...

items.title: Continuous Self-Learning
items.description: Continuously self‑learns from real interactions to refine tone, strategy, and outcomes.

items.title: All-in-one Inbox
items.description: WhatsApp live, Supports 1:1; Instagram DMs; Mobile app for on‑the‑go replies coming soon

items.title: Auto Reply & Copliot Response
items.description: Autopilot for new contacts (beta); Timely nudges to follow up, 24/7 availability; AI suggestions can be edited on the spot

items.title: Fast Setup, No Technical Skills Needed
items.description: Start in minutes without coding. Upload your materials, connect WhatsApp, and your AI sales rep is ready — managing chats the same day.

cards.text: Robotic or template-driven replies that feel generic Handles only simple FAQs or linear conversations.
Human‑sounding, high‑EQ dialogue that mirrors your voice. Elite sales playbooks built‑in.
No goal setting, mostly Q&A or navigation redirection, with limited form collection.
Personalized Goals and Smart Profiling (Title) - Whether you’re focused on increasing sales, building loyalty, or nurturing leads, it tailors its responses and strategies to meet your goals.
Static knowledge bases or limited CRM learning No real learning; improvements require manual updates
Continuously self‑learns from real interactions to refine tone, strategy, and outcomes.

reviews.title: What Our Client Said About Us

items.name: Mark
items.quote: “I got Dealism for customer support, but was shocked to see it driving sales by converting hesitant buyers with expert product answers.This tool literally pays for itself.”

items.name: Devin
items.quote: “ It's not just a bot - Dealism automates 99% of my DMs in my exact voice and make real conversations. I'm finally free to focus on creating content instead of just answering messages.”

items.name: Sarah
items.quote: “Dealism follows my exact rules so perfectly, my customers genuinely think it's me. This saves me 3 hours daily-priceless time I now have for my family.”

items.name: Saray
items.quote: "Dealism has become an essential part of our agency. It doesn’t just handle simple tasks — it truly understands our spirit, our tone, and the way we connect with clients..."
